sieve.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a round wire kitchen tool with a lot of small holes, used for separating solid food from liquid or small pieces of food from large pieces
sieve.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a round wire tool for separating small objects from large objects
sieve.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to put flour or other food through a sieve
sieve.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Sieve the flour and cocoa powder into a bowl.
